title: Graded Frobenius Algebras
abstract:
We construct a PROP which encodes 2D-TQFTs with a grading. This defines a
graded Frobenius algebra as algebras over this PROP. We also give a description
of graded Frobenius algebras in terms of maps and relations. This structure
naturally arises as the cohomology of manifolds, loop homology and Hochschild
homology of Frobenius algebras. In addition, we give a comprehensive
description of the signs that arise in suspending algebras over PROPs.
